changes: Updated IncidentList component props to include onResetFilters
Modified handleResetFilters method to use callback instead of window.location.reload()
Added null check before calling onResetFilters callback

patterns_discovered: Callback prop pattern for handling parent-child component interactions
Defensive programming with optional callback method
Avoiding direct window manipulation in React components
gotchas_discovered: Initial implementation was using window.location.reload() as a reset mechanism
Tight coupling between component reset logic and browser navigation
recommendations: Continue using prop callbacks for component interactions
Avoid direct browser manipulation in React components
Implement reset logic in parent components when possible
